items.label: Dimensions
items.name: ADAM_Video_Dimensions
items.defaultValue: <ref:record file="master" out="metadata" key="movie" xpath="/movie/videoWidth" store="@width" /><ref:record file="master" out="metadata" key="movie" xpath="/movie/videoHeight" store="@height" /><ref:object onAllVariables="@width; @height" ><ref:text out="@width" /> x <ref:text out="@height" /> px</ref:object>

items.label: Asset Name
items.name: bi_AssetName
items.defaultValue:
<ref:record file="master" out="basefilename" store="@fileName" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_AssetName" out="ToString" store="@AssetName" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_PublishedToCdnURL" out="ToString" store="@CdnUrl" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_Brand" out="ToString" store="@brand" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_ProductSKU" out="ToString" store="@ProductSKU" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_PPMSKU" out="ToString" store="@PPMSKU" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_BIXVersion" out="ToString" store="@ProductVersion" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_PPMSKUVersion" out="ToString" store="@PPMVersion" />
<ref:record fieldName="bi_VaultId" out="ToString" store="@VaultId" />
<ref:catch ex="Adam.Core.ItemNotFoundException"> 
<ref:classification search="NamePath = 'Definitions/Category/Product/Product Packaging'" out="id" store="@ClassProductId" /> 
<ref:record fieldName="bi_productCategory" out="value" store="@prodCategoryId" />
<ref:text out="@prodCategoryId" store="@prodCategoryText"/>
<ref:compare value1="@ClassProductId" value2="@prodCategoryText" store="@IsProduct" /> 
<ref:classification search="NamePath = 'Definitions/Category/Asset/Product Packaging'" out="id" store="@ClassPPMId" />
<ref:record fieldName="bi_assetCategory" out="value" store="@assetCategoryId" />
<ref:text out="@assetCategoryId" store="@assetCategoryText"/>
<ref:compare value1="@ClassPPMId" value2="@assetCategoryText" store="@IsPPM" />
<ref:text out="" store="@Update"/>
<ref:text out="@VaultId" store="@CdnUrl" onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@VaultId)"/>
<ref:text out="@CdnUrl" store="@CanUpdate"/>
<ref:text out="PPM" store="@Update" onVariable="IsNotZero(@IsPPM)" /> 
<ref:text out="PRODUCT" store="@Update" onVariable="IsNotZero(@IsProduct)" /> 
<ref:text out="DONTUPDATE" store="@CanUpdate" onVariable="IsEmpty(@Update)" />
</ref:catch>
<ref:text onVariable="IsEmpty(@CanUpdate)"> 
<ref:text out="" store="@SKUName"/> 
<ref:text out="@PPMSKU - @PPMVersion" onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@PPMSKU)" store="@SKUName"/>
<ref:text out="@ProductSKU - @ProductVersion - " onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@ProductSKU)" store="@SKUName"/> 
<ref:text out="@brand" onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@brand)" store="@brandName" /> 
<ref:text out="" onVariable="IsEmpty(@brand)" store="@brandName" /> 
<ref:text out="@SKUName@brandName" onVariable="IsEmpty(@fileName)"/> 
<ref:text out="@fileName" onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@fileName)"/> 
</ref:text>
<ref:text onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@CanUpdate)"><ref:text out="@fileName" store="@AssetName" onVariable="IsEmpty(@CdnUrl)"/><ref:text out="@AssetName" /></ref:text>
items.validation: <ref:catch ex="System.Exception" out="True"><ref:compare value1="@adamUsername" value2="restuser" store="@admin" /> <ref:text out="0" onVariable="IsNotZero(@admin)" store="@administrator" /> <ref:text out="1" onVariable="IsZero(@admin)" store="@administrator" /> <ref:record fieldName="bi_PublishedToCdnURL" out="value" store="@cdn" /> <ref:text out="0" onVariable="IsEmpty(@cdn)" store="@cdnvalue" /> <ref:text out="1" onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@cdn)" store="@cdnvalue" /> <ref:eval expression="@cdnvalue * @administrator" store="@valid" /> <ref:record fieldName="bi_AssetName" out="tostring" store="@new" /> <ref:record id="@adamRecord" fieldName="bi_AssetName" out="tostring" store="@old" /><ref:compare value1="@old" value2="@new" store="@notdirty" /> <ref:text out="0" onVariable="IsNotZero(@notdirty)" store="@dirty" /> <ref:text out="1" onVariable="IsZero(@notdirty)" store="@dirty" /> <ref:eval expression="@dirty * @valid" store="@isValid" /> <ref:text out="False" onVariable="IsNotZero(@isValid)" /> <ref:text out="True" onVariable="IsZero(@isValid)" /></ref:catch>
items.validationErrorMessage: Can not change asset name from <ref:record id="@adamRecord" fieldName="bi_AssetName" out="tostring" onEmpty="nothing" /> to <ref:record  fieldName="bi_AssetName" out="tostring" onEmpty="nothing" />, when the asset is published.

items.label: Asset Use
items.name: bi_AssetUse
items.defaultValue: <ref:catch ex="Adam.Core.ItemNotFoundException"><ref:classification search="NamePath = 'Definitions/Category/Asset/Product Packaging'" out="id" store="@ClassProductId" /><ref:record fieldName="bi_assetCategory" out="value" store="@ProductId" /><ref:text out="@ProductId" store="@ProductIdText"/><ref:compare value1="@ClassProductId" value2="@ProductIdText" store="@IsProduct" /><ref:classification search="NamePath = 'Definitions/Asset Use/General - None specified'" out="id" store="@ClassAssetUseId" /><ref:record fieldName="bi_AssetUse" out="value" store="@AssetUse1"/><ref:text out="@AssetUse1" onVariable="IsZero(@IsProduct)" /><ref:text out="@ClassAssetUseId" onVariable="IsNotZero(@IsProduct)" /></ref:catch>

items.filter:
<ref:catch ex="System.Exception" out="">
    <ref:record out="contenttype" store="@contentType" />
    <ref:record fieldName="bi_assetCategory" out="tostring" store="@category" />
    <ref:compare value1="@category" value2="Simple Asset" store="@simple" />
    <ref:searchExpression expression="FieldName('bi_ClassContentType').Option.Name = ?" param1="@contentType" onVariable="IsZero(@simple)" />
    <ref:searchExpression expression="FieldName('bi_ClassContentType').Option.Name = ? AND FieldName('bi_ClassModularity') = ? " param1="@contentType" param2="Simple" onVariable="IsNotZero(@simple)" />
</ref:catch>

PI leaflet" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /></item><default><ref:record fieldName="bi_PPMSkuView" out="valuename" store="@PPMSkuView" /><ref:text out="@PPMSkuView" store="@PPMSkuViewText"/><ref:text out="-" store="@PPMSkuViewText" onVariable="IsEmpty(@PPMSkuViewText)"/><ref:switch keys="@PPMSkuViewText"><item key="3D"><ref:searchExpression expression="namepath = ?" param1="/Assets/Asset Type/3D rotatable graphic (simple asset)" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /></item><item key="Flat"><ref:searchExpression expression="namepath = ?" param1="/Assets/Asset Type/Artwork - Packaging" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /></item><item key="Image"><ref:searchExpression expression="namepath = ?" param1="/Assets/Asset Type/Artwork - Packaging" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /></item><item key="Image With Measure"><ref:searchExpression expression="namepath = ?" param1="/Assets/Asset Type/Artwork - Packaging" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /></item></ref:switch></default></ref:switch><ref:text out="@classid" onVariable="IsNotZero(@IsPPM)" /><ref:classification search="NamePath = 'Definitions/Category/Product/Product Packaging'" out="id" store="@ClassProductId" /><ref:record fieldName="bi_productCategory" out="value" store="@ProductId" /><ref:text out="@ProductId" store="@ProductIdText"/><ref:compare value1="@ClassProductId" value2="@ProductIdText" store="@IsProduct" /><ref:searchExpression expression="namepath = ?" param1="/Assets/Asset Type/3D static graphic (simple asset)" store="@Expression"/><ref:classification search="@Expression" out="id" store="@classid" /><ref:text out="@classid" onVariable="IsNotZero(@IsProduct)" /><ref:compare value1="@ClassProductId" value2="@ProductIdText" store="@IsPPM" onVariable="IsZero(@IsProduct)" /><ref:record fieldName="bi_AssetType" out="value" store="@AssetType1"/><ref:text out="@AssetType1" onVariable="IsZero(@IsPPM)" /></ref:catch>

items.label: Expiration Date
items.name: bi_ExpirationDate
items.defaultValue:
<ref:setting name="CustomApiEndpoint" store="@CustomApiEndpoint"/>
<ref:text out="731" store="@offset"/>
<ref:record fieldName="bi_ExpirationClassification" out="value" store="@expiration"/><ref:object onVariable="IsNotEmpty(@expiration)"><ref:text out="0" store="@offset"/></ref:object><ref:httpRequest uri="@CustomApiEndpoint/minimumexpirationdate" timeout="15" retryCount="3" hmacHeader="X-SH1">
{
 "manualexpiration":<ref:record fieldName="bi_ManualExpirationDate" out="value" encode="json" />,
 "vaultexpiration":<ref:record fieldName="bi_VaultExpirationDate" out="value" encode="json" />,
 "rightsexpiration":<ref:record fieldName="bi_RightsExpirationDate" out="value" encode="json" />,
 "actualrelease":<ref:record fieldName="bi_ActualReleaseDate" out="value" encode="json" />,
 "offset":<ref:text out="@offset" />,
 "format":"MM/dd/yyyy"
}
</ref:httpRequest>
